channel.title: unity3d on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook
channel.description: Recent content in unity3d on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook

item.title: How you can easily load data into Unity3D using a .JSON file
item.description: In this post, I quickly show a way to load data into Unity3D using a simple .json file. Note there are other & for the most part simpler ways if you use UXF - Unity Experiment Framework, which provide a way to parse on data via .json out of the box.
